Class AbstractKNNHeap<P extends DistanceDBIDPair<D>,D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.generic.AbstractKNNHeap<P,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - pair type
    D - distance type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    KNNHeap<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistanceDBIDPairKNNHeap, DoubleDistanceDBIDPairKNNHeap

    abstract class AbstractKNNHeap<P extends DistanceDBIDPair<D>,D extends Distance<D>>
extends Object
implements KNNHeap<D>
    Heap used for KNN management.

      • poll

        public P poll()
        Description copied from interface: KNNHeap
        Poll the largest element from the heap. This is in descending order because of the heap structure. For a convenient way to serialize the heap into a list that you can iterate in ascending order, see KNNHeap.toKNNList().
        Specified by:
